tool_description:
Get historical price and volume of stocks.
Get many years old historical stock and volume data.

If you have any specific request about any stock, please reach out to us.
name: Stock Price and Volume History
title: Stock Price and Volume History

api_list.name: Get Multiple Days Price and Volume EOD
api_list.description:
Access daily price and trading volume data for securities.
Ideal for backtesting or displaying historical charts.

Upon request, we can supply price and volume data for specific ticker symbols dating back up to 20 years.

api_list.name: Get Single Day Price and Volume EOD
api_list.description:
Access daily price and trading volume data for securities.
Ideal for backtesting or displaying historical charts.

Upon request, we can supply price and volume data for specific ticker symbols dating back up to 20 years.
